title: #4 - MG34 vs. MG42 - Design, Firing Experience etc. talking with a Collector
itunes:title: #4 - MG34 vs. MG42 - Design, Firing Experience etc. talking with a Collector
itunes:subtitle: In this podcast I talk to Phil, who owns an MG34,…
description:
In this podcast I talk to Phil, who owns an MG34, MG42, Bren, Thompson, PPsh43 and quite some other guns. He also has a lot of experience shooting them. Thus, we talk about common misconceptions and myths. Additionally we also talk about the Bren, Thompsons etc.» RELATED VIDEOS «King Tiger: Why NO MG-42, but MG-34?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_8Rka0k1Wp0Hip-firing the MG-34? Büllshit or Historically Accurate?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oOVEXBeA-eI

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
